title.narrative: Preservation of the 19th-Century Andafiavaratra Palace Museum in Antananarivo

description.narrative: Built in 1872 and adapted for reuse as a museum in 1997, the Andafiavaratra Palace Museum preserves objects and historical collections of great importance to the Kingdom of Madagascar. This project involves the restoration of the buildings mud walls (Tamboho) using traditional building methods.

title.narrative: Strengthened Capacities for Improved Coordination, Protection, and Prosecution on Trafficking in Persons (TIP) in Madagascar

description.narrative: The International Organization for Migration (IOM) seeks to contribute to the government of Madagascar and civil society organizations' efforts to improve national capacity in coordinating anti-trafficking responses, protecting victims of trafficking and prosecuting traffickers. The project will institutionalize victim-centered investigations and prosecutions of TIP cases, institutionalize a national referral mechanism and develop a TIP data collection and reporting mechanism.
